  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Client  
    Client.Request  
    Client.Response  
    Content
    Opaque content wrapper.
    HttpStatusShortcuts
    Provides HTTP statuses' shortcuts for expect block so they can be used without additional imports.
    HttpVerbsShortcuts  
    JsonUnitOptionsShortcuts
    Provides JsonUnit options' shortcuts for expect block so they can be used without additional imports.

    MultipartDefinition.MultipartFile  
    MultipartDefinitionBuilder  
    RequestDefinitionBuilder
    Prepares the request for controller action.
    ResponseCookieDefinition

    Sets expectations for the response after the controller action has been executed.
    TestDefinitionBuilder  
    WithContentSupport
    Creates content from inline string.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractClient  
    DefaultMultipartDefinitionBuilder  
    DefaultRequestDefinitionBuilder
    Prepares the request for controller action.
    DefaultResponseDefinitionBuilder
    Sets expectations for the response after the controller action has been executed.
    DefaultTestDefinitionBuilder  
    Gru<C extends Client>
    Gru steals the controller's unit test to verify controller's actions in context.
    GruContext
    Gru context holds result of the controller's method call and any exception thrown during setup or action execution.
    LazyClient
    Lazy initialized client.
    Squad
    Squad is pool of minions engaged in a test.
